title: Silk ribbons in latest Heritage auction
author: mabjae

posts.post_title: Silk ribbons in latest Heritage auction
posts.post_content: If anyone here won the silk ribbons in the latest Heritage auction, I'd be willing to pay you extra if you're willing to part with them. Specifically, the Empire BBC, Williamsport BBC, Oceanic BBC or Rochester police vs. Syracuse police ribbons. Thanks!
